4.definition: Water height estimation and computation of river discharge over Godavari using radar altimeters

5.definition: Satellite Altimetry derived discharge over Godavari River during 2002-2015

6.definition: River heights and river discharge have been estimated using ENVISAT and SARAL/AltiKa over two sites and using Jason-2 over one site along Godavari River. The results arevalidated well with the in-situ data.

7.definition: Dr. Rashmi Sharma OSD/AOSG/EPSA (ISRO), Ahmedabad-380015, India. Ph: +91 79 2691 6044. Email:rashmi@sac.isro.gov.in

8.definition: SARAL/AltiKa and ENVISAT are in 35 day and Jason-2 10 day repetition period
